name: returned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having come back from somewhere, or having been sent back: Recently returned from five years in Paris, he set up a business in London. Returned prisoners sometimes found that their troubles continued after they reached home.
More examplesFewer examplesPsychiatrist James Bland has treated recently returned soldiers with PTSD.She is recently returned from a harrowing two-week trip to the Chad-Sudan border.A gift card will be issued for returned goods.
